channel.title: The Writer's Daily
channel.description:
It's basically a podcast where I shout into the microphone and you pretend to be entertained.
Please send in your comments and questions to thewritersdailypodcast@gmail.com
channel.itunes:summary:
It's basically a podcast where I shout into the microphone and you pretend to be entertained.
Please send in your comments and questions to thewritersdailypodcast@gmail.com
